name: Lying Revenge
description:
Small Game made for Community Game Jam. Project is not fully finished due to limited time. If people like it, I might optimise it and add more to it. 

!!!!!! DONT SHOOT PURPLE CUBES!!!!! WONT BE ABLE TO FINISH GAME DUE TO BUG

Use "W" key to move forward,                   Rotate using mouse

Rotate using mouse                                          1 & 2 AlphaKeys change weapon

Left Click to attack

Kill all enemies and collect all parts to move on.
